name: Sush
greetingText: Well, finally made something for my pasindida aurat <3 !
wishText: In the quiet moments, I find myself whispering your name to the stars, sending my love on the breeze that dances between us. This Valentine's Day, though miles stretch wide, my heart travels the distance in a heartbeat, finding its home in yours. With every sunrise, I'm reminded of your light in my life, and with every sunset, I dream of the day our horizons merge. You are my distant star, my love unbounded. Happy Valentine's Day, my heart's dearest voyage.
